snippet.title: Resident Evil 2 (PC) - Leon A Playthrough Part 1
snippet.description:
Leon makes his way through the City Area. He enters the R. Kendo's gun shop and witnesses the death of its owner by the zombies. Leon reaches the Raccoon City Police Station where he obtains the Blue Card Key from the badly injured Marvin Branagh.
[Fact: On your way to the Police Station, and before you reach the first save point of the game, you have to confront 34 zombies.]

No FMV scenes were included in this playthrough due to incompatibility problem of the recording software. The game was played on Normal difficulty and with a Controller for Xbox 360.

TECHNICAL FEATURES:
Screen Resolution: 640 x 480 16 Bit Colour Full Screen
Shading: Off
Mesh Pattern as Alpha Blending
Bilinear-Filtering: On
Palette-Change: On
Sound Quality: High Quality
Movie: Off
Special Effects: Standard
Number of enemies: Standard
Perspective-Correction: On
